snippet.title: Joe Dever's Lone Wolf HD Remastered launch trailer
snippet.description:
Launch trailer for PC/Mac version of Joe Dever's Lone Wolf.

Lone Wolf is back, as a video game series with a brand-new story, a new combat system, stunning graphics and much more! Make meaningful choices and carve your own path through this epic non-linear story. Test your strength with the dynamic turn-based combat system, prove your skill with the lock-picking minigame and accept the challenge of wits posed by the mysterious Shianti Cube!

The HD Remastered version features graphic enhancements both in the book and combat sessions, a new control system for mouse and keyboard, a rich extra section, with artworks, 3D models and other goodies.

Download the game from Steam: http://store.steampowered.com//app/279440

For all the details, check the official site: http://lonewolfthegame.com
and join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lonewolfthegame
